bike.description: 100% Cr-Mo street frame, 38mm TT/DT, No Oval head tube, integrated rotor plate, X-Wire brake routing, 6mm D.O.

components.description: Specialized 100% Cro-Mo 2 piece, 150mm rise x 580 width,  9 deg back sweep, 3 deg up sweep
Dia-Tech AD-996W "Hombre", U-brake front and rear, "Fiesta" kit w/ rear dual quick release arms
Specialized tubular Cr-Mo 3-piece, L & R drive compatible, 170mm
Specialized 44t alloy solid disc type with CNC center/drive hole and teeth
Specialized, 19mm OD 8 splined Cr-Mo spindle, alloy cups, sealed cartridge bearing
9/16" Cr-Mo axle, loose ball, alloy platform w/ press pins
SUN Rhyno Lite XL L7, 36 hole, 20" double wall, CNC sidewalls, eyelets
Specialized "Wide Load", 36 hole,  double sealed mech., 14mm hollow Cr-Mo axle, alloy shell
Specialized "Flip Side" (right and left F/W thread), 36 hole,  double sealed mech., 14mm hollow Cr-Mo axle, alloy shell
14g stainless steel w/brass nipples (Front: L189/R189mm Rear: L186/R186mm)
Specialized street with 8mm rails and X-brace
Specialized Flush-Mount peg (2pcs) system w/integrated chain tensioner and fork adapters, alloy fork cap, chain guard, reflectors, manual
